name: Shellout Games Demo
description:
Elizabeth the Cat Thing wants to do a live performance, but there's one problem. No money! Clamboy hatches a plan to make money: Make a video game! Big problem. Nobody'll buy it if they don't know about it! So Clamboy gathers his friends to run door to door to spread the word about his upcoming game.

Play 20 different microgames, many with varying levels of difficulty! These microgames have four different control styles: Mouse, Keyboard, Mouse+Keyboard, and Microphone!

Get a high score! As high as you can! Higher than that! That's all you can really do in this game, so buckle up!

This is a game I worked on for a pretty good while. It's pretty buggy since I made it myself and I'm not a coder, but I poured a lot of work into it! I hope one day I can create a more competent full game, but for now, this is it.

The music was provided by my talented friend Hansov! The characters belong to both Rodent-Cat and me.
